column2: A letter of authority given to the Petitioner to sell/supply and distribute
petrol and diesel, lubricants and grease with effect from 15th November
A  letter  dated  12th  December,  2023  issued  by  the  3A  Respondent-
Respondent,  (“the  Managing  Director  of  the  CPC”)  to  the  Petitioner
informing the Petitioner to commence business operations forthwith.
